title: Title under warehouse receipt defeated in certain
context: ยง490:7-205 Title under warehouse receipt defeated in certain cases. A buyer in ordinary course of business of fungible goods sold and delivered by a warehouse that is also in the business of buying and selling such goods takes the goods free of any claim under a warehouse receipt even if the receipt is negotiable and has been duly negotiated. [L 2004, c 163, pt of ยง1]
